title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.12 - Unofficial use by pilot of name of pilot organization or board prohibited; fine
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.12 - Unofficial use by pilot of name of pilot organization or board prohibited; fine

State Regulations

The use by any pilot licensed by this board of the name of a
pilot organization, or of the name of the board, for the purpose of advertising
or carrying on any business other than that which appertains to the proper
duties of the pilots, is hereby forbidden. Failure to comply with this section
shall subject the pilot to a fine of $100. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

56.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
